alert.note: Alert for Warren; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Warren and eastern Wilkes Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Danburg to Aonia to Camak, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camak, Aonia, Cadley, Delhi, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Mesena, Metasville, Floral Hill, and Holliday Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for east central Georgia.
